OUR COMPETENCE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”4px||205px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/CONSTRUCTION-2-scaled.jpg” title_text=”CONSTRUCTION 2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_enable_color=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” filter_brightness__hover_enabled=”on|hover” filter_brightness__hover=”92%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_text_color=”#004b4f” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” link_text_color__hover=”#e02b20″]

GMCI is a worldwide supplier of high-quality industrial materials for the construction and building industries.Our company has a strong experience in applications; we deliver products that are easy to use and of the desired standard as per International Standards that meet global expectations.

At GMCI, we believe that customers come first. We will respond to your specific supply needs and requirements and jointly develop the best solution for them, if necessary. With our broad spectrum of mineral solutions, from solar panels, dry mortar, plasters, adhesives, and screening products to ceramic sanitary equipment, flooring, paint, tile, pipes and window frameworks, GMCI is in a unique position to help the industry face these challenges.

GMCI solutions make it easy to produce and deliver fast. Talc, Kaolin and Calcium Carbonate, for example, give hardness in paints such that they can be coated with a single layer. The production and curing of strength in dry-mix filling is facilitated by calcium aluminium. The mechanical properties for lower weights of sealants are enhanced by calcium carbonate and kaolin.
